


<!-- @namespace    sugar.js.dom -->

# ```js exitFullscreen ```


Exit the fullscreen mode



## Example (js)

```js
import exitFullscreen from '@coffeekraken/sugar/js/dom/exitFullscreen'
exitFullscreen()
```
